1: וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will come</n> בְּאַחֲרִ֣ית <sup>319 </sup> <n>But in the last</n> הַיָּמִ֗ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> יִ֠הְיֶה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will come</n> הַ֣ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>it shall come to pass [that] the mountain</n> בֵּית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> נָכוֹן֙ <sup>3559 </sup> <n>shall be established</n> בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>in the top</n> הֶהָרִ֔ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>of the mountains</n> וְנִשָּׂ֥א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>and it shall be exalted</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> מִגְּבָע֑וֹת <sup>1389 </sup> <n>above the hills</n> וְנָהֲר֥וּ <sup>5102 </sup> <n>shall flow</n> עָלָ֖יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> עַמִּֽים׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and people</n>
2: וְֽהָלְכ֞וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>shall come</n> גּוֹיִ֣ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nations</n> רַבִּ֗ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>And many</n> וְאָֽמְרוּ֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> לְכ֣וּ ׀ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Come</n> וְנַעֲלֶ֣ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and let us go up</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַר־ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>to the mountain</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and to</n> בֵּית֙ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and to the house</n> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <sup>430 </sup> <n>of the God</n> יַעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> וְיוֹרֵ֙נוּ֙ <sup>3384 </sup> <n>and he will teach</n> מִדְּרָכָ֔יו <sup>1870 </sup> <n>us of his ways</n> וְנֵלְכָ֖ה <sup>1980 </sup> <n>may walk</n> בְּאֹֽרְחֹתָ֑יו <sup>734 </sup> <n>in his paths</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>from</n> מִצִּיּוֹן֙ <sup>6726 </sup> <n>of Zion</n> תֵּצֵ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>shall go forth</n> תוֹרָ֔ה <sup>8451 </sup> <n>for the law</n> וּדְבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>and the word</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> מִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>from Jerusalem</n>
3: וְשָׁפַ֗ט <sup>8199 </sup> <n>And he shall judge</n> בֵּ֚ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> עַמִּ֣ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> רַבִּ֔ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>among many</n> וְהוֹכִ֛יחַ <sup>3198 </sup> <n>and rebuke</n> לְגוֹיִ֥ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nations</n> עֲצֻמִ֖ים <sup>6099 </sup> <n>strong</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> רָח֑וֹק <sup>7350 </sup> <n>afar off</n> וְכִתְּת֨וּ <sup>3807 </sup> <n>and they shall beat</n> חַרְבֹתֵיהֶ֜ם <sup>2719 </sup> <n>their swords</n> לְאִתִּ֗ים <sup>855 </sup> <n>into plowshares</n> וַחֲנִיתֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <sup>2595 </sup> <n>and their spears</n> לְמַזְמֵר֔וֹת <sup>4211 </sup> <n>into pruninghooks</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and never</n> יִשְׂא֞וּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>shall not lift up</n> גּ֤וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nation</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> גּוֹי֙ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>against nation</n> חֶ֔רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>a sword</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and never</n> יִלְמְד֥וּן <sup>3925 </sup> <n>neither shall they learn</n> ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <sup>4421 </sup> <n>war</n>
4: וְיָשְׁב֗וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>But they shall sit</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> תַּ֧חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> גַּפְנ֛וֹ <sup>1612 </sup> <n>under his vine</n> וְתַ֥חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>and under</n> תְּאֵנָת֖וֹ <sup>8384 </sup> <n>and under his fig tree</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> מַחֲרִ֑יד <sup>2729 </sup> <n>and none shall make [them] afraid</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> פִ֛י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>for the mouth</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> צְבָא֖וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> דִּבֵּֽר׃ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>hath spoken</n>
5: כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Though</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>For all people</n> יֵלְכ֕וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>walk</n> אִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every one</n> בְּשֵׁ֣ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>in the name</n> אֱלֹהָ֑יו <sup>430 </sup> <n>of his god</n> וַאֲנַ֗חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> נֵלֵ֛ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>will walk</n> בְּשֵׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>in the name</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>our God</n> לְעוֹלָ֥ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n> וָעֶֽד׃ <sup>5703 </sup> <n>and ever</n> פ
6: בַּיּ֨וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>In that day</n> הַה֜וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֹֽסְפָה֙ <sup>622 </sup> <n>will I assemble</n> הַצֹּ֣לֵעָ֔ה <sup>6760 </sup> <n>her that halteth</n> וְהַנִּדָּחָ֖ה <sup>5080 </sup> <n>her that is driven out</n> אֲקַבֵּ֑צָה <sup>6908 </sup> <n>and I will gather</n> וַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הֲרֵעֹֽתִי׃ <sup>7489 </sup> <n>and her that I have afflicted</n>
7: וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <sup>7760 </sup> <n>And I will make</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַצֹּֽלֵעָה֙ <sup>6760 </sup> <n>her that halted</n> לִשְׁאֵרִ֔ית <sup>7611 </sup> <n>a remnant</n> וְהַנַּהֲלָאָ֖ה <sup>1972 </sup> <n>and her that was cast far off</n> לְג֣וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nation</n> עָצ֑וּם <sup>6099 </sup> <n>a strong</n> וּמָלַ֨ךְ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>shall reign</n> יְהוָ֤ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> בְּהַ֣ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>over them in mount</n> צִיּ֔וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>Zion</n> מֵעַתָּ֖ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>from henceforth even for</n> עוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>ever</n> פ
8: וְאַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> מִגְדַּל־ <sup>4026 </sup> <n>And thou O tower</n> עֵ֗דֶר <sup>5739 </sup> <n>of the flock</n> עֹ֛פֶל <sup>6076 </sup> <n>the strong hold</n> בַּת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>of the daughter</n> צִיּ֖וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>of Zion</n> עָדֶ֣יךָ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> תֵּאתֶ֑ה <sup>857 </sup> <n>unto thee shall it come</n> וּבָאָ֗ה <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> הַמֶּמְשָׁלָה֙ <sup>4475 </sup> <n>dominion</n> הָרִ֣אשֹׁנָ֔ה <sup>7223 </sup> <n>even the first</n> מַמְלֶ֖כֶת <sup>4467 </sup> <n>the kingdom</n> לְבַ֥ת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>to the daughter</n> יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>of Jerusalem</n>
9: עַתָּ֕ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> לָ֥מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>why</n> תָרִ֖יעִי <sup>7321 </sup> <n>Now why dost thou cry</n> רֵ֑עַ <sup>7452 </sup> <n>aloud</n> הֲמֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> אֵֽין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> בָּ֗ךְ אִֽם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Or</n> יוֹעֲצֵךְ֙ <sup>3289 </sup> <n>in thee? is thy counsellor</n> אָבָ֔ד <sup>6 </sup> <n>perished</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הֶחֱזִיקֵ֥ךְ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>have taken</n> חִ֖יל <sup>2427 </sup> <n>? for pangs</n> כַּיּוֹלֵדָֽה׃ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>thee as a woman in travail</n>
10: ח֧וּלִי <sup>2342 </sup> <n>Be in pain</n> וָגֹ֛חִי <sup>1518 </sup> <n>and labour to bring forth</n> בַּת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>O daughter</n> צִיּ֖וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>of Zion</n> כַּיּֽוֹלֵדָ֑ה <sup>3205 </sup> <n>like a woman in travail</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> עַתָּה֩ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> תֵצְאִ֨י <sup>3318 </sup> <n>for now shalt thou go forth</n> מִקִּרְיָ֜ה <sup>7151 </sup> <n>out of the city</n> וְשָׁכַ֣נְתְּ <sup>7931 </sup> <n>and thou shalt dwell</n> בַּשָּׂדֶ֗ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>in the field</n> וּבָ֤את <sup>935 </sup> <n>and thou shalt go</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> בָּבֶל֙ <sup>894 </sup> <n>[even] to Babylon</n> שָׁ֣ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> תִּנָּצֵ֔לִי <sup>5337 </sup> <n>there shalt thou be delivered</n> שָׁ֚ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> יִגְאָלֵ֣ךְ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>shall redeem</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>there the LORD</n> מִכַּ֖ף <sup>3709 </sup> <n>thee from the hand</n> אֹיְבָֽיִךְ׃ <sup>341 </sup> <n>of thine enemies</n>
11: וְעַתָּ֛ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>and now</n> נֶאֶסְפ֥וּ <sup>622 </sup> <n>are gathered</n> עָלַ֖יִךְ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> גּוֹיִ֣ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nations</n> רַבִּ֑ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>Now also many</n> הָאֹמְרִ֣ים <sup>559 </sup> <n>against thee that say</n> תֶּחֱנָ֔ף <sup>2610 </sup> <n>Let her be defiled</n> וְתַ֥חַז <sup>2372 </sup> <n>look</n> בְּצִיּ֖וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>upon Zion</n> עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>and let our eye</n>
12: וְהֵ֗מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָֽדְעוּ֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>But they know</n> מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <sup>4284 </sup> <n>not the thoughts</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הֵבִ֖ינוּ <sup>995 </sup> <n>neither understand</n> עֲצָת֑וֹ <sup>6098 </sup> <n>they his counsel</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> קִבְּצָ֖ם <sup>6908 </sup> <n>for he shall gather</n> כֶּעָמִ֥יר <sup>5995 </sup> <n>them as the sheaves</n> גֹּֽרְנָה׃ <sup>1637 </sup> <n>into the floor</n>
13: ק֧וּמִי <sup>6965 </sup> <n>Arise</n> וָד֣וֹשִׁי <sup>1758 </sup> <n>and thresh</n> בַת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>O daughter</n> צִיּ֗וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>of Zion</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> קַרְנֵ֞ךְ <sup>7161 </sup> <n>thine horn</n> אָשִׂ֤ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>for I will make</n> בַּרְזֶל֙ <sup>1270 </sup> <n>iron</n> וּפַרְסֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>6541 </sup> <n>thy hoofs</n> אָשִׂ֣ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and I will make</n> נְחוּשָׁ֔ה <sup>5154 </sup> <n>brass</n> וַהֲדִקּ֖וֹת <sup>1854 </sup> <n>and thou shalt beat in pieces</n> עַמִּ֣ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> רַבִּ֑ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>many</n> וְהַחֲרַמְתִּ֤י <sup>2763 </sup> <n>and I will consecrate</n> לַֽיהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> בִּצְעָ֔ם <sup>1214 </sup> <n>covet</n> וְחֵילָ֖ם <sup>2428 </sup> <n>and their substance</n> לַאֲד֥וֹן <sup>113 </sup> <n>unto the Lord</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the whole earth</n>
